title: Pixel 5 AOD (Always-On-Display) doesn't dim when on the Pixel Stand
content:
I have AOD turned on on my Pixel 5.
Normally when I charge my Pixel 5 via cable, AOD stays at a high-brightness for a few seconds and then it dims automatically. 
But when I put it on the Pixel Stand AOD stays always at high brightness, which is unbearable in a dark room at night.

In the Pixel Stand app I have everything disabled except for "Do Not Disturb while docked".

Anyway to enable AOD dimming when on the Pixel Stand?
